title: Ep. 61 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Whitney Cummings & Bert Kreischer
description:
Are you ready to party with the bears this New Years Eve? Head over to https://ymhstudios.com/livestream and get your tickets now!

Become a paid channel member of YMH to experience an AD-FREE version of the show here : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYIgiXwJck_Pb5Nj-wIrsqg/join

SPONSORS: - Buffalo Trace. This is damn good whiskey - Go to https://Talkspace.com or download the Talkspace app and use promo code BEARS for $100 off your first month. - New U.S. customers can redeem a Harry’s Trial Set at https://Harrys.com/BEARS for just $3! You’ll get a five-blade razor, a weighted ergonomic handle, foaming shave gel with aloe, and a travel cover. Go to https://JoinFightCamp.com/BEARS and get free shipping and a gift valued up to $109 with your purchase during this limited time holiday offer. - Go to https://Zendesk.com/bears and see for yourself why the best customer experiences are built with Zendesk. - Get your first visit absolutely free at https://ForHims.com/bears

Whitney Cummings joins Bert Kreischer in Tom Segura's place for this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave. They discuss Tom Cruise's on-set rant, the cars they've owned throughout their life, Reese Witherspoon, whether or not they would join the SNL cast, Elliot Page's transition, getting in trouble for cultural appropriation, and much more!
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
